content.rendered:
Rahima Graduated from University of East London with a BA in Business Economics and completed a PGCE in Post Compulsory Education from Oxford Brookes University.  Rahima has been teaching Business and Economics since 2013 within FE colleges and HE providers, she started working for Regent College London in January 2019. Within her time in Education Rahima has managed HND programmes, University partnership programmes and taught across level 3-5 in business.

Key responsibilities

  • Working alongside the academic team and other departments to ensure that the assessments process is followed throughout the entire assessment cycle for all programmes delivered at Regent College
  • Improve student satisfaction within the assessment cycle
  • Ensure assessment schedules are adhered to

 Courses taught

Rahima has taught on the Level 4 and 5 units on the HND in Business across various pathways and her area of expertise is within business strategy and people management units.
